histogram.name: Geolocation.AuthorizationActionExistingUser
histogram.summary: Records the action performed by an existing user when prompted to authorize the use of location by Chrome.

histogram.name: Geolocation.Header.LocationAge
histogram.obsolete: Code for recording this histogram was removed in July 2022. Recording this long-expired histogram was slowing down navigations.
histogram.summary: For Geolocation requests from the omnibox on Android, the time since the location was most recently acquired. If no location has been acquired, the maximum bucket is incremented.

histogram.name: Geolocation.Header.PermissionState
histogram.obsolete: Code for recording this histogram was removed in July 2022. Recording this long-expired histogram was slowing down navigations.
histogram.summary: Counts Geolocation requests for omnibox searches sliced by various permission combinations. The location mode abbreviations indicate one of: High Accuracy, Battery Saving, GPS On or Location Mode Off.

histogram.name: Geolocation.Header.TimeListening
histogram.obsolete: Code for recording this histogram was removed in July 2022. Recording this long-expired histogram was slowing down navigations.
histogram.summary: For Geolocation requests from the omnibox on Android, the time since the location was first acquired. If no location has been acquired, the minimum bucket is incremented.

histogram.name: Geolocation.HeaderSentOrNot
histogram.summary: Reason why the X-Geo header was or was not included in a Google search from the omnibox.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.AccessPoints
histogram.summary: The number of WiFi access points used to determine geolocation.

histogram.name: Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.Event
Geolocation.NetworkLocationRequest.ResponseCode
Geolocation.PositionCache.CacheHit
histogram.summary: For each query into the position cache used by the network location provider, records whether a position was returned from the cache.

histogram.name: Geolocation.PositionCache.CacheSize
histogram.summary:
For each query into the position cache used by the network location provider, records the number of items in the cache.
Warning: this histogram was expired after 2021-03-10 and brought back 2021-05-21; data may be missing.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SettingsDialog.AcceptEvent
histogram.summary: Records the backoff level when the Location Settings Dialog is accepted by the user.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SettingsDialog.DenyEvent
histogram.summary: Records the backoff level when the Location Settings Dialog is rejected by the user.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SettingsDialog.ShowEvent
histogram.summary: Records the backoff level when the Location Settings Dialog is shown to the user.

histogram.name: Geolocation.SettingsDialog.SuppressEvent
histogram.summary: Records the backoff level when the Location Settings Dialog is suppressed due to backoff.

histogram.name: Geolocation.Timeout
histogram.summary: Counts Geolocation request timeout values, bucketing by timeout duration. This is recorded for all requests upon creation, see Geolocation.TimeoutExpired for timeouts that actually expired.

histogram.name: Geolocation.TimeoutExpired
histogram.summary: Counts Geolocation request timeout expirations, bucketing by timeout duration. This means no position was received within the allowed time from the browser process due to e.g. a slow network or an unresponsive system location provider.

histogram.name: Geolocation.WifiDataProviderCommon.WifiScanTaskTime
histogram.summary: Records the time taken on Windows, macOS and Linux to query the operating system for nearby access points.
